name: Grilled S'mores Ice Cream Sandwiches
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Bite into these delicious Grilled S'mores Ice Cream Sandwiches from Jodi Moreno of What's Cooking Good Looking. Chocolate gets melted over graham crackers on the grill and then finished with a big scoop of ice cream.
ingredients: 2  whole graham crackers, broken into two square halves
2 scoops ice cream (flavor of your choice)
Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil for the Grill
directions: Preheat the grill to medium heat
Fold a sheet of Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil for the Grill in half, making a rectangle about 8x11-inches, and place it onto the grill in the center
Place 2 graham cracker squares onto the foil and place the chocolate squares on top
Close the grill and cook for about 3 to 5 minutes until the chocolate has melted
Using a spatula, transfer the crackers to a plate
Scoop some ice cream onto the crackers with chocolate, and then top with the other cracker squares
You can also serve these open faced by just using one graham cracker and melted chocolate with one scoop of ice cream
